scripts.dev: cross-env NEXT_DISABLE_LIGHTNINGCSS=1 CSS_TRANSFORMER_WASM=1 TURBOPACK= next dev --webpack
scripts.build: cross-env NEXT_DISABLE_LIGHTNINGCSS=1 CSS_TRANSFORMER_WASM=1 TURBOPACK= next build --webpack
scripts.start: cross-env NEXT_DISABLE_LIGHTNINGCSS=1 CSS_TRANSFORMER_WASM=1 TURBOPACK= next start --webpack
